content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Beam® Fixed Focal Endoscope Couplers are a cost effective way to connect any C-mount or SLR camera to an endoscope without compromising on quality. They come in a variety of focal lengths to get the right magnification on any camera and can be sterilized.

  • Available in 17mm, 20mm, 24mm, and 35mm focal lengths
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • Insulated
  • Sterilization validated
  • Leak tested
  • Eyepiece clamp will accommodate a standard 32mm eyepiece.
  • Compatible with C-mount or SLR cameras

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72467,72468,72466″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1573846109011{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Fixed Focal Couplers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our Accu-Beam® Fixed Focal Couplers are a cost-effective way to connect any C-mount or SLR camera to any endoscope. They save you money and offer more camera flexibility by preventing you from having to buy a brand new camera to get endoscopic video.

Various lens options and built-in focus control ensure you get the best image on your camera. A quality, sterilizable design ensures the coupler will last as long as you need it.

Part # 8007I – 17mm Focal Length
Part # 8008I – 20mm Focal Length
Part # 8009I – 24mm Focal Length
Part # 8013I – 35mm Focal Length[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d544de6-193e”][vc_column_text]Compatible with all C-mount video cameras.

Compatible with endoscopes using a standard 32mm eyepiece.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d4de6-193e”][vc_column_text]Fixed Focal Endoscope Couplers are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a4de6-193e”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
